name: Tokino Sora
about: Debuting on September 7, 2017, she is the first Virtual Idol of Hololive Production. She loves singing and horror games, and her dream has been to “hold a live concert at Yokohama Arena” since the very beginning.

name: AZKi
about: A diva who became reborn into the virtual world in order to fabricate a new world.

name: Robocosan
about: A lonely, wimpy robot from a random wasteland. She is now hoping to contact and live with lots of people as a Virtual Liver.

name: Sakura Miko
about: Nya-hello! It's Sakura Miko!

name: Shirakami Fubuki
about: A white haired kemomimi (animal-eared) highschool student.

name: Natsuiro Matsuri
about: A rookie on the Cheerleading Team. Cheerful and affectionate, her pleasant attitude means she gets along with everyone.

name: Yozora Mel
about: A vampire girl. Even though she is a vampire, she is not into blood. She loves acerola juice quite a lot.

name: Akai Haato
about: A sassy kouhai. She is often prickly, however she manages to demand lots of attention from those with whom she has been getting along well.

name: Aki Rosenthal
about: A girl who traveled from a different universe. She has hyper curiosity and manages to reach out to all sorts of things.

name: Minato Aqua
about: A marine maid-styled virtual maid. She is trying her very best, yet is still sometimes awkward and clumsy.

name: Yuzuki Choco
about: A health doctor from the Demonic-Realm Academy. Has a high reputation around the school.

name: Nakiri Ayame
about: A kimono-clad Oni girl from the Demonic-Realm Academy. As she loves to prank people, she always uses will-o’-the-wisp on them just to have fun.

name: Murasaki Shion
about: A random self-proclaimed child (though she is probably an adult) who appears around the Demonic-Realm Academy.

name: Oozora Subaru
about: The manager of an MMA club and an E-sports club. A supremely spirited, cheerful, lively girl who can talk to anyone without breaking a sweat.

name: Ookami Mio
about: A black haired kemomimi girl who appeared on our radar randomly. She often shows up around shrines. She likes gaming.

name: Inugami Korone
about: The dog from a random bakery. She likes to play games when she has free time while watchdogging.

name: Shiranui Flare
about: A half-elf who seems sloppy and undependable, however when it is time, she becomes an extremely reliable big sis.

name: Shirogane Noel
about: While she is easy-going, she has a dangerous side where she attempts to solve all her problems with muscle power.

name: Houshou Marine
about: Ahoy! Houshou Pirate Captain, Houshou Marine here!

name: Usada Pekora
about: A lonely rabbit-eared girl who loves carrots. She loves them so much that she always brings a few anywhere she goes.

name: Uruha Rushia
about: A necromancer from the Demonic-Realm Academy who is not good at communicating with people.

name: Hoshimachi Suisei
about:
It's your shooting star, your diamond in the rough, idol VTuber Hoshimachi Suisei! A forever18 VTuber who deeply loves singing and idols.
Her dream is to one day hold a live concert in Tokyo Budokan.

name: Amane Kanata
about: An angel from the Angelic-Realm Institution. She is now studying how to heal people. To hide her shyness, she pretends to be cool.

name: Tsunomaki Watame
about: A sheep bard that goes around everywhere. She loves singing and is fluffy! YES! FLUFFY! Being a herbivore, she loves potato chips.

name: Tokoyami Towa
about: In order to become an archdemon, she joined the human society for further studies.

name: Yukihana Lamy
about: A snow elf from a noble family renowned in the remote Land of Silver.

name: Momosuzu Nene
about: A girl who came from another world to chase after her idol dream. She likes singing, dancing, and drawing.
